Find this:

Find this:

item.description:
@CoderOops wrote:

I had this same problem earlier… Fixed tho.
Check all shop ids, so you’re not leading it to buy with points from different shop.

item.title: Pi Point Shop Help?
item.dc:creator: @cdj cdj
item.description:
@cdj wrote:



Okey The Shop Says… Howmuch It Cost… But When U Purchase… It TAKES. Coin’s Insted Of Points?
How My Shop Assiant Set Up
Ihave all My ITEMS set Up In Case: Ect… But Like
Its Taking Gp. Insted Of The Points.

if (c.myShopId == 25) { c.sendMessage(c.getItems().getItemName(removeId)+": currently costs " + getSpecialItemValue(removeId) + " DxRx Points."); return; } if (c.myShopId == 21) { c.sendMessage(c.getItems().getItemName(removeId)+": currently costs " + getSpecialItemValue(removeId) + " DxRx Points"); return; }
public int getSpecialItemValue(int id) { switch (id) { case 15021://Arcane Spirit Shield return 150; case 15039://Chaotic Maul return 100; case 15050://SOL return 50; ECt....
public void handleOtherShop(int itemID) { 
		if(c.myShopId == 21 || c.myShopId == 25 || c.myShopId == 56) {
			if (c.pcPoints >= getSpecialItemValue(itemID)) {
				if (c.getItems().freeSlots() > 0){
					c.pcPoints -= getSpecialItemValue(itemID);
					c.getItems().addItem(itemID,1);
					c.getItems().resetItems(3823);
				}
			} else {
				c.sendMessage("You do not have enough DxRx Points  to buy this item.");			
			}

		}
	}</blockquote>

Read full topic
